message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper deals with human action recognition and prediction, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO). The use of tailored loss functions and generative models also suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the use of dynamic images as a representation of human motion suggests a possible connection to multimedia (cs.MM).
